{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WGR101 |revision= |upc=606449036497 |ean= |asin=B0002CWPV8 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/21/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model=IP802SM |manuf_rev=v1 |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY3WGR101,P27IP802SM |ic_id=4054A-WGR101 |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88W8510 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800TTC-70 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=4 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM636165TS-6 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8510 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os=eCos |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=NETGEAR-TRAVEL |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR-TRAVEL$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:09:5B,00:0F:B5 |oui_eth=00:09:5B,00:0F:B5 }} ''54 Mbps Wireless Travel Router''
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WGR101|vs_id=2582}} OEM [[SerComm IP802SM v1]] :The FCC ID printed on the label is almost certainly PY3WGR101. The FCC ID of the parent product is P27IP802SM. [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/24707-headtoheadwgr101 HeadToHead: 3Com Office Connect vs. NETGEAR Wireless 54Mbps Travel Routers - SmallNetBuilder] Per the manual, the default SSID is '''NETGEAR-TRAVEL'''. ==Additional notes== [http://www.ecoscentric.com/ecos/examples.shtml The '''eCosCentric''' product showcase notes this device as using '''eCos'''.]
